column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Yeah so be prepared to wait for a table
column2: but it's really worth it. Delicious pizzas and great service. My only bugbear was the menu selection wasn't fantastic. But for deep-dish pizza you will literally think about for the rest of your trip
column3: this place wins hands down. Don't get lured in by the hype over Gino's East
column4: walk three blocks to Lou's and take in what Chicago eats.
